com.freshbourne.io
Class RawPage

java.lang.Object
  com.freshbourne.io.RawPage

public class RawPage
extends java.lang.Object

This class wraps a byte array and usually has an id and a source Long is chosen as id, although in most scenarios Integer should be sufficient. However, Long can be used in more cases. Maybe this class gets refactored to enable also Integer ids.
